### Load required libraries

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| include: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

require(tidyverse)
require(Seurat)
```

## Process data

```{r}
#| echo: true

li_WB <- list.files("../data/")

purrr::imap(setNames(li_WB, li_WB), function(obj, name){
  Seurat::Read10X(paste0("../data/", obj)) |> 
    Seurat::CreateSeuratObject(min.cells = 3,
                               project = name)
}) -> seurat_list

```
